sentences.sContent: Rachel, you must have misunderstood her! Ellie would never say something like that.
sentences.sCn: 雷切尔，你一定是误会她了！埃莉绝不会说那样的话。

sentences.sContent: Don’t misunderstand me. She’s a very nice person when you get to know her.
sentences.sCn: 不要误解我的意思。你了解她后就会知道她是个很好的人。

trans.tranOther: to fail to understand someone or something correctly
